pages.title: testing
pages.text: A $(l:conjuring:basics/conjuring_focus)Conjuring Focus$() does a good job, but sometimes it is not enough. If you want it to work overtime you require a stronger lens. A $(item)Stabilized Conjuring Focus$(), which is reinforced with $(l:conjuring:basics/soul_composite_materials#soul_slice)Soul Slices$(), is exponentially more powerful. Once you insert a stablizied focus there is no telling how far you have to go to stop the souls from spawning.
